topics: empathy, affect, interpersonal, congruence, social perception
additional_comments: ILIADD study; randomly initiated ESM surveys not available in this dataset; number of max. time points taken as maximum of observations in data; day and beep information missing

features.name: empathy_global
features.coding:
Mean of other two empathy categories (3 items) and additional item:
"When the person(s) I interacted with showed emotions, I 
felt their emotions inside of me."
0 = Neutral
10 = Very positive
Likely person-mean centered
features.details:
Mean of other two empathy categories (3 items) and additional item:
"When the person(s) I interacted with showed emotions, I 
felt their emotions inside of me."

features.name: empathy_cog
features.coding:
Mean of two items:
"I considered what the person(s) I interacted with was 
thinking." and "I considered what the person(s) I interacted with was feeling."

0 = Neutral
10 = Very positive
Likely person-mean centered
features.details:
Mean of two items:
"I considered what the person(s) I interacted with was 
thinking." and "I considered what the person(s) I interacted with was feeling."

features.name: empathy_aff
features.coding:
When the person(s) I interacted with showed emotions, I 
felt their emotions inside of me.
0 = Neutral
10 = Very much
Likely person-mean centered
features.details:
When the person(s) I interacted with showed emotions, I 
felt their emotions inside of me.

features.name: pa_self
features.coding:
How positive did you feel during the interaction?
0 = Neutral
10 = Very positive
Likely person-mean centered
features.details: How positive did you feel during the interaction?

features.name: pa_other
features.coding:
How positive were their emotions during the interaction?
0 = Neutral
10 = Very positive
Likely person-mean centered
features.details: How positive were their emotions during the interaction?
features.construct: positive affect, affect, interaction, external rating

features.name: na_self
features.coding:
How negative did you feel during the interaction?
0 = Neutral
10 = Very negative
Likely person-mean centered
features.details: How negative did you feel during the interaction?

features.name: na_other
features.coding:
How negative were their emotions during the interaction?
0 = Neutral
10 = Very negative
